file.saveAs.description: Save the current file with a new name

edit.selectAll.description: Select all text in the current document

edit.find.description: Find text in the current document

edit.replace.description: Find and replace text in the current document

navigation.goToLine.description: Go to a specific line number

navigation.goToDefinition.description: Go to the definition of the symbol under cursor

navigation.goToDeclaration.description: Go to the declaration of the symbol under cursor

navigation.goBack.description: Go back to the previous cursor position

navigation.goForward.description: Go forward to the next cursor position

debug.stepOver.description: Step over the current line during debugging

debug.stepInto.description: Step into the function call during debugging

debug.stepOut.description: Step out of the current function during debugging

debug.toggleBreakpoint.description: Toggle breakpoint on the current line

navigation.nextWord.description: Move cursor to the next word

navigation.previousWord.description: Move cursor to the previous word

navigation.addCursorAtNextMatch.description: Add cursor at the next occurrence of the current word

navigation.removeCursorAtPreviousMatch.description: Remove cursor from the previous occurrence of the current word

navigation.lineEnd.description: Move cursor to the end of the line

navigation.lineStart.description: Move cursor to the beginning of the line

navigation.fileEnd.description: Move cursor to the end of the file

navigation.fileStart.description: Move cursor to the beginning of the file
